short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a pop-up with a list of Reddit posts with the current url.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generates a pop-up with a list of Reddit posts that match with the current url.

Note: That does mean it sends the url of every website you visit to reddit. But you can change that behaviour in the settings.
